items.label: Document baseline body mass index greater than 60 kg and and initial (BMI) ≥ 27 kg/m^2.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that the patient does NOT have a personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2, or history of pancreatitis, malabsorption syndromes, cholestasis, pregnancy, and/or lactation
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document no history of an eating disorder (e.g., anorexia, bulimia).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document previous failure of a weight loss treatment plan (e.g., nutritional counseling, an exercise regimen and a calorie/fat-restricted diet) in the past 6 months and will continue to follow as part of the treatment plan.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Documentation of current medical status including nutritional or dietetic assessment.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Documentation of current therapy for all medical conditions (including obesity), identifying specific treatments including medications.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document current accurate height and weight measurements (within 30 days)
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document current weight loss plan or program including diet and exercise plan
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document member is not concurrently on Victoza or Ozempic or other GLP-1 inhibitors.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document baseline body mass index greater than 60 kg and and initial (BMI) ≥ 30 kg/m^2.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that the patient does NOT have a personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2, or history of pancreatitis, malabsorption syndromes, cholestasis, pregnancy, and/or lactation
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document no history of an eating disorder (e.g., anorexia, bulimia).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document previous failure of a weight loss treatment plan (e.g., nutritional counseling, an exercise regimen and a calorie/fat-restricted diet) in the past 6 months and will continue to follow as part of the treatment plan.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Documentation of current medical status including nutritional or dietetic assessment.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Documentation of current therapy for all medical conditions (including obesity), identifying specific treatments including medications.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document current accurate height and weight measurements (within 30 days)
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document current weight loss plan or program including diet and exercise plan
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document member is not concurrently on Victoza or Ozempic or other GLP-1 inhibitors.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document patient has achieved weight loss of at least 5% of initial baseline weight.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document the patient's current BMI is > 24 kg/m^2.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).
